entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:23 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
